name: X          | Examine*

Filter inputs when active. See Text Input help screen for more:

Hotkey+B     | Reset Filter

These inputs are active while in an inventory:
X            | Examine

Select       | Toggle Categories
L1+Select    | Switch Selection Mode
Start        | Toggle Favorite
LS Left      | Show/Hide All Contents
LS Right     | Show/Hide Contents
L3           | Organize Contents

This input is active while in construction:

These inputs are active while crafting:
X            | Show Recipe Result

R2           | Batch Crafting
L3           | Show Unread at Top

L3           | Sort Bionics

These inputs are active while in Mutations:

R3           | Toggle Sprite

Y            | Swap Armor Side
L3           | Sort Armor
R1           | Assign Invlets
R2           | Unequip Selected Armor

name: R2         | Use Wielded Item*
messages:
Use an item that you are wielding. Most any item can be used, from weapons to tools to electronics devices.
L1+R2 will let you choose from another item on hand or nearby to wield. Upon switching, you can put away or drop the previous item.
L2+R2 will change the attack mode of the wielded item. If the item has no attack modes, nothing will happen.

name: L1/L2+Dpad | Diagonal Movement
messages:
R3     | Smash something in a chosen direction. L1+D-Pad to lock to diagonals. Press Select to smash something below you. Useful for pulping dead enemies.
L1+R3  | Grab something in a chosen direction.
L2+R3  | Haul items you're standing on with you. Press again to stop hauling.

messages: How did you get here? Press B to return.

name: L1+R2       | Wield Item
messages:
Left Stick Left to close door/window/curtain/etc..
Left Stick Right peek around corners. After activation, press a direction to start peeking. L1+D-Pad can be used to lock to diagonals.
When peeking, using D-Pad to move around. You can additionally use Left Stick Up/Down to peek up/down. B to cancel.

name: L2+R2       | Item Attack Mode
messages:
Left Stick Left to close door/window/curtain/etc..
Left Stick Right peek around corners. After activation, press a direction to start peeking. L1+D-Pad can be used to lock to diagonals.
When peeking, using D-Pad to move around. You can additionally use Left Stick Up/Down to peek up/down. B to cancel.
